description:
Masako disguises herself as a waitress at the hot spring hotel in order to steal Yuri`s half of the diary. However, the half she manages to steal is in fact a fake that Yuri had setup beforehand.
While Masako plans her next move, the trusted maid of the Natsume family, Renjyaku, is secretly watching over Kamba and Himari. She ends up finding Himari wearing the penguin hat, where she is informed about the survival strategy...
Source: Official Site
